name: Capsule Man X
description:
My March entry for the GDFG Monthly Game Jam, this month's theme was sequels.  I tried to expand on my February submission (Crystal Carrier) in this entry.

Asset Credits:

Fire level textures/materials: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/free-stylized-pbr-te...

First level background: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/painted-hq-2d-forest-medie...

Second level textures/materials:  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/futuristic-panel-tex...

Second level background: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/dynamic-space-backgr...
